revised_title: Observations on Bone Structure and Periosteum
tldr: The author, Mr. Leeuwenhoek, shares his observations on the structure of bones and the periosteum. He describes the intricate network of small blood vessels in the bone and how they connect to the periosteum. He also discusses the role of the bony particles in conveying an oily substance into the periosteum, which is then carried throughout the body. Lastly, he mentions the presence of blood vessels within the bone marrow.
